Microservices template

Source: R/templates.R
template_microservices.Rd

Microservices template

Usage

template_microservices(
  services = c("service1", "service2"),
  databases = c("postgres"),
  message_queue = NULL,
  api_gateway = TRUE,
  title = "Microservices Architecture"
)

Arguments

services

Character vector of service names

databases

Character vector of database names

message_queue

Message queue type (optional)

api_gateway

Include API gateway

title

Diagram title
